title: Ashley Graham throws on one of Kim Kardashian's Skims bras as she wraps her 80 hour work week
text:
She's fresh off of her 80 hour work week and inching closer to her due date.

Ashley Graham, 31, took to her Instagram on Friday evening to share a short clip of her in full glam dancing to celebrate the end of her busy week before throwing on a comfortable Skims bra made by one of her close friends, Kim Kardashian.

The model shared a video of herself cradling her growing bump while wearing the nude bralette.

80 Hour work week: Ashley Graham took to her Instagram on Friday evening to share a short clip of her in full glam dancing to celebrate the end of her busy week before throwing on a comfortable Skims bra made by one of her close friends, Kim Kardashian

Looking good! In the video, she wore a dark green silk slip dress with her hair slicked back into a high braided pony tail

'Definitely the most comfortable bra I have worn through my pregnancy, thank you Kim, thank you Skims,' she said in the video.

She had her dark hair thrown up into a pony tail and donned a fresh face after taking off her makeup.

'That feeling when you get home and you take your bra off, and your done,' she also added as she changed into something a bit more comfortable.

Getting comfy: The model shared a video of herself cradling her growing bump while wearing the nude bralette

Since announcing her pregnancy back in August, she's had quite the busy schedule.

'Ya girl had an 80hr work week, let the weekend celebrations begin!' she said in the caption.

In the video, she wore a dark green silk slip dress with her hair slicked back into a high braided pony tail.

Dance party: She had a bit of a dance party by herself as she danced it out and even attempted a high kick

Ashley and her husband Justin Ervin announced they were expecting their first child on their nine year wedding anniversary.

'Nine years ago today, I married the love of my life,' she said in the heartfelt post.

'It has been the best journey with my favorite person in the world! Today, we are feeling so blessed, grateful and excited to celebrate with our GROWING FAMILY! Happy anniversary, @mrjustinervin ❤️ Life is about to get even better.'

All done! 'That feeling when you get home and you take your bra off, and your done,' she also added as she changed into something a bit more comfortable
description: She's fresh off of her 80 hour work week and inching closer to her due date. Ashley Graham, 31, took to her Instagram on Friday evening to share a short clip of her in full glam dancing to celebrate .
